it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core

Class Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.AbstractNamed
      • it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.Control
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Named
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Control

    public class Control
extends AbstractNamed
implements Named
    Objects created from this class are bigraphical controls describing the arity (i.e. the number of ports) of nodes decorated with it. Every Bigraph has a Signature describing the controls that can be assigned to its nodes; every Node should be assigned exactly one control.

      • Control

        public Control(int arity)
        Creates a control for the given arity and assign it a fresh name.
        Parameters:
        arity - a non-negative integer defining the number of ports of the nodes decorated with this control.

        Creates a control for the given name and arity
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the control.
        arity - a non-negative integer defining the number of ports of the nodes decorated with this control.
